news_articles.title: Crypto In The Land Of Smiles: Thailand Scraps Gains Tax Until 2029
news_articles.description: Thailand’s finance ministry has unveiled a plan to drop capital gains tax on cryptocurrencies for five years. news_articles.description: A South Korean court has acquitted Lee Hyung-soo, CEO of crypto investment firm Haru Invest, of criminal fraud charges linked to the alleged mismanagement of investor funds amounting to over $650 million.
